introduction.title: Privacy Policy
introduction.content: At Hashibis, we are committed to protecting the privacy and confidentiality of our customers' personal and medical information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information. By accessing or using our website and services, you consent to the practices described in this policy.

informationCollection.title: Information Collection and Use
informationCollection.content: We may collect personal and medical information that you provide to us voluntarily or that is required for your interaction with our website and services. This may include:
services: Contact details (name, email address, phone number)
Medical information (if applicable, for medical consultations)
Usage data (cookies, IP address, browsing history)

informationUse.title: Use of Information
informationUse.content: We use the collected information for various purposes, including:
uses: Processing orders and providing customer support
Conducting internal analysis and improving our services
Complying with legal and regulatory requirements

medicalInformation.title: Medical Information
medicalInformation.content: If you choose to provide medical information for the purpose of medical consultations, we treat this information with the utmost confidentiality. Medical information is used only for the intended purpose, such as providing personalized recommendations and ensuring your safety while using cannabis products. We do not share your medical information with any third parties without your explicit consent.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We employ industry-standard security measures to protect your personal and medical information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. We utilize encrypted connections (SSL) for data transmission, and we regularly review our security practices to ensure your data's integrity.

thirdPartyServices.title: Third-Party Services
thirdPartyServices.content: We may use third-party services that collect information to enhance your experience and analyze user behavior. However, these third parties are bound by their own privacy policies and practices, and we do not control their activities.

yourChoices.title: Your Choices
yourChoices.content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. You can also manage your communication preferences and opt-out of promotional emails. To exercise these rights, please contact us at [contact email/phone number].

legalRequirements.title: Legal Requirements
legalRequirements.content: We may disclose your information if required by law, legal processes, or regulatory authorities. We may also disclose information to protect our rights, privacy, safety, or property.

childrenPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.content: Our services are intended for individuals of legal age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under the age of [legal age in your jurisdiction]. If you believe we have collected information from a minor, please contact us immediately.

changesToThisPolicy.title: Changes to this Policy
changesToThisPolicy.content: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests related to your privacy, please contact our Privacy Officer at [privacy contact details].
